name: Data Conversion Laboratory
tag_list: data, conversion, ebooks, xml, spl, digial-publishing, consulting, cms
overview:
Since its founding in 1981, Data Conversion Laboratory (DCL) remained faithful to its guarantee to construct unparalleled electronic document conversion services based on the rich legacy of superior customization and exceptional quality.

DCL is a leading, US-based organization that currently operates one of the most advanced facilities of its kind, with extensive capabilities to capture data from text from virtually any computer medium and format, as well as from paper and microfilm, and reformat it to fit a client’s emergent needs. DCL has provided conversion services and software to a broad range of industries including publishing, aerospace, defense, automotive, telecommunications, computer hardware and software, professional societies, government agencies, and utility providers, successfully converting more than 200 million pages to date.
